title: Add Value to a Smart Card
description: A passenger is at a station kiosk and wants to add $20 to their transit smart card.

tasks.description: The passenger taps their smart card on the kiosk reader.
tasks.expected_outcome: The kiosk reads the card number and displays the current balance.

tasks.description: The passenger selects the option to add value and chooses the $20 amount.
The passenger pays with a credit card, and the payment is processed.
The system sends a command to the kiosk to write the new balance to the passenger's smart card.
tasks.expected_outcome: The card's balance is updated, and the kiosk displays the new total.
